name: Deki's Dungeon Slayer
description:
Welcome back to another assignment of mine!

This time I got a little whack a mole - HTML/CSS/Javasctipt edition (no canvas)

The game:

All you gotta do, is exactly in the titel - SLAY! Try to kill as many bats as possible and collect the chest for even more points!

What would be a good dungeon crawler without mimics? Right? So be careful if they bite u you're going to lose life, as long as you still have some, after that it's going to steal you your valuable time >:D

The Goal? SLAY EM ALL and AS MANY AS POSSIBLE! Collect points and create a new Highscore for yourself ;)

Have fun && Enjoy!
